short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vote With Your Money supports informed choices by showing political contributions from executives and employees of visited websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See political contributions made by executives and employees of the website you're visiting.

All data comes from publicly available Federal Election Data from 2023 forward, representing over 44 million individual contributions and $11 billion contributed to PACs and candidates. Where available, additional executive donation data comes from various public sources.

Note about privacy: This extension requires access to 'read and change data on your websites', and we understand that sounds scary. Unfortunately, this is the minimum permission we can request in order to send the URL you're visiting to our servers so we can look up and present donation data. AT NO TIME is ANY data from the content of your pages or any personal information about you sent to or stored on our servers. Read more here: https://votewithyourmoney.ai/privacy
